channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Toluwalase Okuwoga
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Toluwalase Okuwoga

item.title: Recommender System
item.description: Explored the dataset Built a model using User Based Collaborative Filtering Deployed the model in a Shiny app Link to Website Link to Github Repository

item.title: Insurance Cost Prediction
item.description: Explored the dataset Prepared the dataset for training Created a linear regression model Trained the model to fit the data Made predictions using the trained model Link to Github Repository

item.title: Commodity Trade
item.description: Cleaned the data to fill missing values and deal with outliers. Used different visualization techniques to derive meaningful insight from the Data. Created a Dashboard using Dash by Plotly to visualize the top 10 Countries in trade by USD. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Image Classifier
item.description: Explored the CIFAR10 dataset: https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~kriz/cifar.html Set up a training pipeline to train a neural network on a GPU Experimented with different network architectures & hyperparameters Link to Github Repository

item.title: Hotel bookings prediction
item.description: Did an Exploratory Data Analysis to better understand the data and answer some important questions. Created a model that predicts whether or not a guest that has booked will actually come. Evaluated the features that are the most important to predict cancellations. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Covid-19 Live Dashboard
item.description: Built a dashboard that automatically updates based on the statistics data of all countries . Added a section for Global trending Covid news. Link to Website

item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn GitHub E-mail Medium
